alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 05 at 2:53PM MDT until April 06 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect until 7 PM this evening for strong winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 226...227...230...233 and 237, which includes El Paso County, the lower elevations of Las Animas County, and Baca County... ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect for Wednesday from 11AM to 9PM for strong winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 224 and 226 through 237, which includes the San Luis Valley and all of the plains... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 226...227...230...233 AND 237... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 9 PM MDT WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 226...227...230...233 AND 237... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 226...227...230...233 and 237. * Winds...North 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread Tuesday and again on Wednesday.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher
